column1: The Purple Pig////Worth the wait! If you're planning on a romantic quiet place
column2: don't line up. If you're looking for good food and to make some friends
column3: definitely get in line! Even before they open
column4: there's already people hungry and waiting to eat. The Purple Pig doesn't take reservations so don't bother calling ahead
column5: just prepare at least 30+ mins of wait time.
